com.hci.geotagger.activities
Class FriendListActivity

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      com.hci.geotagger.activities.FriendListActivity

public class FriendListActivity
extends ListActivity

This class is not used in current iteration of GeoTagger. Originally, this class allows a user to view friends associated with their profile. You could also add or remove a friend from an adventure based on their username. Lastly, you can view a friend's profile
